directions: In a large bowl, stir together the avocados, lime juice, orange juice, pineapple juice, cumin, cilantro and salt. Mix in hot pepper sauce if using. Serve immediately, or refrigerate until serving. Place one of the avocado pits into the bowl to help keep it fresh.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, or to taste (optional)
title: Citrus Infused Guacamole
